document.full_text: a russian think tank published a proposed campaign platform for its chairman, president dmitry medvedev, urging him on tuesday to seek re-election by calling for broader democracy and reform of the security services.
document.title: think tank urges russia's medvedev to run in 2012
lines_and_colors: a russian think tank published a proposed campaign platform for its chairman, president dmitry medvedev, urging him on tuesday to seek re-election by calling for broader democracy and reform of the security services.
